snippet.title: Chernobylite Story Trailer [Official]
snippet.description:
☢️🙂☢️ Support us on KICKSTARTER! ☢️🙂☢️ 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thefarm51/chernobylite-survival-horror-in-3d-scanned-chernob?ref=7cffl2

Add the game to your wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1016800
Get the daily pics on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chernobylite/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ChernobyliteGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChernobylGame
VK: https://vk.com/chernobylitegame
Discord: https://discord.gg/mehRmzY 

Hey stalkers!

Chernobylite is about the story of people who try to survive in a hostile environment. The same is with our work on the project - we travel to Chernobyl Zone to capture 3D-scanned data and create the most believable environment possible for this kind of game.

We have just started the Kickstarter campaign. It lets you pre-order the game and buy many cool gifts and it will also let us collect some support to do the Chernobylite location expansions plus add some extra features that we were always dreaming of.

Are you with us?
